thread.title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces Watches & Clocks for Musicians & Music Lovers
thread.title_full: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces Watches & Clocks for Musicians & Music Lovers

author: prbuzz.com
title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces Watches & Clocks for Musicians & Music Lovers
text:
Los Angeles, CA (PRBuzz) October 20, 2015 -- WatchBuddy® -- one of the nation’s finest and most popular brands of Theme Watches and Wall Clocks ( www.lovableproducts.com ) -- proudly announces the release of a vast collection of Watches and Clocks targeting Musicians and Music Lovers! They are great as gifts especially for Christmas and Hanukah gifts!
Each of these finely crafted precision timepieces is graced with a beautiful dial picture of a Musical Theme, Music Composers or Musical Instruments such as: The Treble Clef Symbol; Great Composers such as Bach, Beethoven, Mozart and Mendelssohn; Instruments such as Guitars, Violins and Drum Sets; There are also beautiful depictions of Classical, Country & Western, Rock & Roll and Jazz Musicians.
Thus WatchBuddy® Timepieces magically transform watches & clocks from mere timepieces into delightful and joyful Objects of Delight for Musicians and Music Lovers!
For further information about the WatchBuddy – Musician and Music Lovers Watch and Clocks please visit: www.lovableproducts.com (the search tool in the right upper hand corner is very helpful to locate the desired item – for example use keywords: Watch (or Clock) plus the preferred subject such as your favorite composer - such as Bach, Beethove or Mozart).or favorite instrument.
WatchBuddy Watch and Clocks are also featured on many major online shopping venues such as Amazon.com. Most noteworthy is that WatchBuddy’s Store - All Lovable Products by WatchBuddy – is one of the highest rated seller’s on Amazon.com based on Customer Satisfaction Ratings and Customer Service Metrics.
_ _ _ _
About WatchBuddy® Brand Products:
WatchBuddy® is a registered trademark brand of watches, jewelry and fashion accessories held by GreatMerchants.com, Inc., a large group of web based and brick & mortar businesses bringing unique, innovative and creative products and services to consumers.
